target: i will and i hope yours is too .
context: <user> hi , i am getting married soon . are you married ?  <system>  haha , no time . i have got a novel to finish . <user> cool . do you have any pets ?  <system>  no , but i would like to get a fish or something calming . <user> my dog is going to be in my wedding at the park .  <system>  how cute . since i quit being a translator , i spend most of my time writing . <user> what kind of books do you write ?  <system>  i am writing a fantasy novel . i do not make much but i am really passionate about it .<user> that is still a great skill to have .  <system>  yeah , there is gonna be a wedding scene too .<user> cool . make it super magical .  <system>
